name: Kiot
0:
”Alexa, Turn off Bulb”
”Alexa, Turn off Tube Light”
”Alexa, Turn on Fan”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this skill People can control all there kiot controlled smart home appliances. 
People need to buy Kiot Smart Home products Like - Kiot 4 Node Swicth, Kiot 3 Node Switch, Kiot Power or Kiot Red. 
After installing and configuring these products in the Kiot Mobile application you can link your account to this skill. 
After linking you can use alexa voice interface to control any of those devices like turning on or off, setting fan speeds or changing channels on TV etc..
